roleset.name: take excessive profits, be a pirate

example.name: profiteer-v: the one example
example.text: `` Let 's not forget this is the same company that has been profiteering with this drug for 2 1/2 years , '' Mr. Weiss added .

example.name: profiteering-n
example.text: Old man Mao Yushi says that the money made from usury is " the best use of money " , says that opportunistic profiteering creates wealth and is n't exploitation , his argument undoubtedly appears to be so ridiculously childish and self - deceptive !

roleset.note: PROFITEER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'profiteer' based on wsj; nominal 'profiteering' based on BOLT-6. No Verbnet entry. (from profiteer.01-v)
PROFITEERING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from profiteering.01-n)
